• Experience with data analysis or scripting to accelerate simulations (e.
• , Python with NumPy or Pandas) Familiarity with FineSim and/or HSPICE, SystemVerilog, and scripting languages (Python/Tcl/Perl) Strong analytical problem-solving skills and ability to work in cross-disciplinary teams Familiarity with memory design (DRAM/HBM/SRAM) and SoC/IO interfaces Pursuing a degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field Experience reading schematics, timing diagrams, and RTL Clear written and verbal communication skills Intern - HBM Design EngineerRichardson, Texas, United States of AmericaPosted 19 hours ago Principal HBM Design EngineerAtlanta, Georgia, United States of AmericaPosted 4 months ago Intern - HBM Design EngineerRichardson, Texas, United States of AmericaPosted a month ago.
